m_szDocSumamry: Chrysler Launching Plug-in Hybrid Minivan Late Next Year October 15th, 2014 by James Ayre   Chrysler is currently planning to launch a plug-in hybrid electric version of the next Chrysler Town & Country minivan sometime late next year, as per recent comments made by the company’s CEO Sergio Marchionne at the Paris Motor Show. This is in spite of the fact that the company’s CEO has previously made his dislike of plug-in electric cars well known.
